name: Don't Leaf me (Esmmazing)
description:
Gram and Pops have returned from the afterlife to take care of their beloved garden, which their grandson neglected after inheriting their home. They have to work together to fulfill the plants’ needs and push them towards sunbeams and shade.

How long will you be able to keep them alive? Grab a buddy and find out by playing this arcade-like co-op game!

‘Don’t leaf me’ was made in 72 hours as part of a gamejam. While we didn’t have time to participate in the last Ludum Dare, we used its theme: ‘Keep it alive’.
